Text.Page:
It is my dream to collect and care for every companion in Arborea.

However, I cannot catch some of them on my own, so I am planning to purchasing them from the Valkyon Federation.

I am collecting as many of them as possible.

However, I need Special Companion Passes for this, which I am not allowed to buy in bulk.
If you bring me some, you can exchange them for my treasures!
